TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509Extension extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData

span.span: Represents an X509 extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks X509 扩展是动态的扩展属性，可将其添加到 X509 证书并进行更改。X509 extensions are dynamic, extended properties that can be added to an X509 certificate and changed. 类可用于创建与证书相关联的扩展，但不是证书颁发机构颁发的证书的一部分 (CA) 。The class can be used to create extensions that are associated with a certificate but are not part of a certificate as issued by a certification authority (CA). 在其最基本的形式中，X509 扩展具有对象标识符 (OID) ，这是一个描述扩展是被视为关键还是不被视为关键的布尔值，以及 ASN 编码的数据。In its most basic form, an X509 extension has an object identifier (OID), a Boolean value describing whether the extension is considered critical or not, and ASN-encoded data. 自定义扩展插件可以在文件中注册 。Custom extensions can be registered in a file. The.NET 框架包括几个常见 X509 扩展的实现：The.NET Framework includes implementations of several common X509 extensions: - .. 描述证书的密钥用法。Describes the key usages of a certificate. - .. 描述证书的约束。Describes the constraints for a certificate. - .. 描述证书的增强型密钥用法。Describes the enhanced key usages of a certificate. - .. 描述密钥标识符。Describes the key identifier. 例如，与 XMLDSIG 一起使用。For example, used with XMLDSIG. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates using the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/VB/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个空 对象，这不同于此类的其他构造函数，该构造函数使用从字节数组、指针或证书文件创建对象的证书信息。This constructor creates an empty object, unlike the other constructors for this class that use certificate information from either a byte array, a pointer or a certificate file to create the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates using the class.
